text: Francisco Sanchez d'Avolio (born 16 May 1986 in Baudour) is a retired Belgian football player. == Career == ===Club career=== He began his career 1992 by CD Furia Espagnola Baudour, before 1994 scouted from R.S.C. Anderlecht, than joined to R. Francs Borains. 1995 signed a contract Standard Liège and moved 1999 to R.E. Mouscron, played there 8 years and moved on 31 January 2008 on loan to FCV Dender EH, in summer 2008 was sold from Dender. == Privates == He also holds Spanish citizenship. == References == ==External links== * Footgoal Profile * Voetbal International Profile * Excelweb Profile Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian people of Spanish descent Category:Royal Excel Mouscron players Category:F.C.V. title: Francisco Sanchez d'Avolio
